abstract.t: This document defines the structure, format, and features of the naming scheme for the objects defined in the Delay-Tolerant Networking (DTN) Application Data Model (ADM), in support of challenged network management solutions described in the Delay- Tolerant Networking Autonomous Management Architecture (AMA). This document defines a new Asynchronous Resource Identifier (ARI), based on the structure of a common URI, meeting the needs for a concise, typed, parameterized, and hierarchically organized set of data elements.
